EXTRACTED VALUE: Forza Motorsport 2 is a drivers best option for a well rounded simulation expereince so far in the next generation of gaming.
PGR continues to dazzle us with an impressive array of top notch motors, solid gameplay and incredible and challenging online play.
It's a game like nothing you've ever played before and something we can't recommend highly enough.
A major factor in the addictive and fun nature of Guitar Hero II is the excellent learning curve.
Rock Band's longevity will last as long as it has support for it.
